Message:
Mom, Dad, guess what?
I’ve made some friends.

Today, they’re taking me to
the flower shop.

And guess what?
I’ve actually...
found someone I like.

Wh-Who that person is...
is still a secret...

But, he’s so nice to me,
and as kind as you two were...

He’s really popular among
everyone, so I can’t keep him
for myself...

But one day, I wonder if we’ll
get to be like you two were...
I’d love that...

Oh, looks like everyone’s here.
Let’s continue when I get back,
okay?

I’ll be heading out then!
See you guys later!
